title: Strengthening Instructional Competencies: Mastering Mathematical Induction: Problem-Solving Strategies Based on Quasi-Inductive Reasoning

context.prior_knowledge: Understanding of Basic Logic and Propositional Proofs, Experience Writing Simple Proof Problems
context.additional_context: Competency enhancement program for professionals in education/teaching/learning fields

learning_goals: Learners can explain the logical flow of the inductive phase in quasi-inductive tasks through visual and verbal expressions
Learners can distinguish between "assumptions of the proposition to be proven" and "assumptions of the inductive hypothesis" with over 80% accuracy in written form
Learners can solve mathematical induction problems by applying a three-stage verification process (quasi-induction → partial proof → full proof)
difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
